panels.description: Tempo médio para a primeira resposta ao ticket, nas últimas 24 horas

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  AVG(gt.takeintoaccount_delay_stat - TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, gt.date, gt.date_creation)) AS "Tempo Médio"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.date_creation >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND (gg.completename LIKE '%Suporte%' OR gg.completename LIKE '%Infra%' OR gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%')
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0

panels.title: SLA 1ª Resposta Geral (24 h)

panels.description: Tempo médio de atendimento dos tickets encerrados nas últimas 24h.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  AVG(gt.solve_delay_stat - TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, gt.date, gt.date_creation)) AS "Tempo Médio"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.solvedate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND (gg.completename LIKE '%Suporte%' OR gg.completename LIKE '%Infra%' OR gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%')
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY 
  "Tempo Médio" DESC;

panels.title: Tempo Médio Atendimento Geral (24 h)

panels.description:
Filtra os tickets criados nas últimas 24 horas, de acordo com o status, separado por Departamento
Encerrado engloba Solucionados e Fechados
Em atendimento engloba Atribuídos e Planejados

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN gg.completename LIKE '%InfraEstrutura%' THEN 'InfraEstrutura'
    WHEN gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%' THEN 'Sistemas'
    WHEN gg.completename LIKE '%Suporte%' THEN 'Suporte'
    WHEN gg.completename LIKE '%Pessoas%' THEN 'Gestão de Pessoas'
    WHEN gg.completename LIKE '%Administração%' THEN 'Administração'
    ELSE "Outros"
  END AS "Departamento",
  COUNT(gt.id) as "Total",
  SUM(gt.status IN (5,6)) as "Encerrado",
  SUM(gt.status IN (2,3)) as "Em Atendimento",
  SUM(gt.status = 1) as "Novo",
  SUM(gt.status = 4) as "Pendente"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.date_creation >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
  AND (gg.completename LIKE '%Suporte%' OR gg.completename LIKE '%Infra%' OR gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%')
GROUP BY 
  Departamento
ORDER BY 
  Departamento;

panels.title: Tickets por Departamento (24 h)

  AND gt.is_deleted = 0

panels.title: SLA 1ª Resposta Infra (24 h)

panels.description: Tempo médio de atendimento dos tickets encerrados nas últimas 24h.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  AVG(gt.solve_delay_stat - TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, gt.date, gt.date_creation)) AS "Tempo Médio"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.solvedate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND gg.completename LIKE '%Infra%'
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY 
  "Tempo Médio" DESC;

panels.title: Tempo Médio Atendimento Infra (24 h)

panels.description:
Filtra os tickets criados nas últimas 24 horas, de acordo com o status
Encerrado engloba Solucionados e Fechados
Em atendimento engloba Atribuídos e Planejados

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(gt.date_creation, '%d/%m %H:00') as "Hora",
  COUNT(gt.id) as "Total",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status IN (5,6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Encerrado",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status IN (2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Em Atendimento",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Novo",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Pendente"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.date_creation >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) 
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
  AND gg.completename LIKE '%Infra%'  
GROUP BY Hora
ORDER BY Hora ASC;

panels.title: Tickets Infra (24 h)

panels.description:
Filtra os tickets criados nas últimas 24 horas, de acordo com o status
Encerrado engloba Solucionados e Fechados
Em atendimento engloba Atribuídos e Planejados

  DATE_FORMAT(gt.date_creation, '%d/%m %H:00') as "Hora",
  COUNT(gt.id) as "Total",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status IN (5,6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Encerrado",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status IN (2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Em Atendimento",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Novo",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Pendente"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.date_creation >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) 
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
  AND gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%'  
GROUP BY Hora
ORDER BY Hora ASC;

panels.title: Tickets Sistemas (24 h)

panels.description:
Filtra os tickets criados nas últimas 24 horas, de acordo com o status, separado por Departamento
Encerrado engloba Solucionados e Fechados
Em atendimento engloba Atribuídos e Planejados

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(gt.date_creation, '%d/%m %H:00') as "Hora",
  COUNT(gt.id) as "Total",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status IN (5,6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Encerrado",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status IN (2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Em Atendimento",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Novo",
  SUM(CASE WHEN gt.status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Pendente"

  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.date_creation >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) 
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
  AND gg.completename LIKE '%Suporte%'  
GROUP BY Hora
ORDER BY Hora ASC;

panels.title: SLA 1ª Resposta Sistemas (24 h)

panels.description: Tempo médio de atendimento dos tickets encerrados nas últimas 24h.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  AVG(gt.solve_delay_stat - TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, gt.date, gt.date_creation)) AS "Tempo Médio"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  LEFT JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.solvedate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%'

panels.title: Tempo Médio Atendimento Sistemas (24 h)

panels.description: Filtra chamados encerrados / média tempo / por agente nas últimas 24h.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CONCAT(gu.firstname,' ',gu.realname) as "Nome",
  COUNT(gt.id) as "Total",
  COUNT(gt.solvedate) as "Solucionados",
  AVG(NULLIF(gt.solve_delay_stat, 0) - TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, gt.date, gt.date_creation)) AS "Média",
  gg.name as "Setor"
FROM 
  glpi_tickets gt
  JOIN glpi_tickets_users gtu ON gt.id = gtu.tickets_id
  JOIN glpi_users gu ON gu.id = gtu.users_id
  JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id
WHERE 
  gt.date_creation >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND gg.completename LIKE '%InfraEstrutura%'
  AND gtu.type = 2
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
GROUP BY 
  Nome
ORDER BY 
  Setor ASC

panels.title: Tickets por Agente Infra (24 h)

  CONCAT(gu.firstname,' ',gu.realname) as "Nome",

  gg.name as "Setor"

  JOIN glpi_users gu ON gu.id = gtu.users_id
  JOIN glpi_groups_tickets ggt ON ggt.tickets_id = gt.id
  JOIN glpi_groups gg ON ggt.groups_id = gg.id

  AND gg.completename LIKE '%Sistemas%'
  AND gtu.type = 2
  AND gt.is_deleted = 0
GROUP BY 
  Nome
ORDER BY 
  Setor ASC
